quote-text: Itâs okay to change your yes to a no. Yeses arenât permanent. Theyâre something we choose again and again, each and every day. It doesnât matter whether you said yes to a job, a date, a relationship, sex, a favor to a friend, a social endeavor, or a vow of silence â you donât ever have to commit to something that forces you to compromise who you are and what feels right; especially if itâs something you agreed to under pressure, intimidation, or force. Changing your yes to a no might make people angry. It might hurt their feelings, cause them to see you as a flake, and result in lost connections.
